mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ho_diagnosis( HO_DIAGNOSIS_CODE, HO_TREATMENT_CODE, HO_DISEASE_CODE, HO_DIAGNOSIS_WRITE_DATE, HO_GO_SENDSTATE) SELECT if(HO_DIAGNOSIS_CODE is null, diagnosis_1, CONCAT('diagnosis_', max(cast(substring(HO_DIAGNOSIS_CODE,11,5) as UNSIGNED ))+1)), #{hoTreatmentCode}, #{hoDiseaseCode}, now(), 0 FROM ho_diagnosis

INSERT INTO ho_prescription( HO_PRESCRIPTION_CODE, HO_TREATMENT_CODE, HO_MEDICINE_CODE, HO_PRESCRIPTION_DAILYDOSE, HO_PRESCRIPTION_DAILYCOUNT, HO_PRESCRIPTION_TOTALDAY, HO_PRESCRIPTION_USAGE, HO_PRESCRIPTION_WRITE, HO_PRESCRIPTION_STATE, HO_GO_SENDSTATE) SELECT if(HO_PRESCRIPTION_CODE is null, prescription_1, CONCAT('prescription_', max(cast(substring(HO_PRESCRIPTION_CODE,14,5) as UNSIGNED ))+1)), #{hoTreatmentCode}, #{hoMedicineCode}, #{hoPrescriptionDailydose}, #{hoPrescriptionDailycount}, #{hoPrescriptionTotalday}, #{hoPrescriptionUsage}, now(), 0, 0 FROM ho_prescription
